name: RollerBall Racing
description:
RollerBall Racing is a little prototype I created, to learn the ins and outs of making a racing and a local split-screen game.  I have enjoyed making this prototype so far and would like to continue to work on and expand it into a full game.  I am looking for your feedback and suggestions to make it the best possible game it can be.   This prototype/demo is free to download and play, so enjoy!

Programmed to work with XBox 360 controllers (one to four local players).

Controls

  • Left-stick: movement and steering.
  • A Button: boost.

Update Log (version 0.2):
    - Added a new track to the game, both a forward and reverse version of it.
    - Updated the background to the player select and track select screens.
    -  Added a finish line banner to both race tracks.
    - Sound effects no longer continue playing when the race is paused or ends.
    - Fix a bug with the boost not displaying/working correctly in the air.
